EmailTemplate.name: 2024 - Classrooms Q1
EmailTemplate.subject: Modular classroom building for {!Account.Name}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi! Are you thinking you might need to lease or purchase a modular classroom building for the '24/'25 school year?
BOXX Modular is hear to help you proactively plan so you don't have to worry about space.
You can view our standard floor plans through these links or we can build you a custom building to suit your schools needs.
CLASSROOMS | https://www.boxxmodular.com/classrooms/ LABORATORIES & RESTROOMS | https://www.boxxmodular.com/specialty/
To connect with us for more information:
> Reply to this email > Request a quote on our website | https://www.boxxmodular.com/quote-request/ > Call 877-966-7839 to speak with one of our local experts
We are here to help!
